root.name: Langrisser IV & V: Final Edition
root.description: OverviewLangrisser IV V: Final Edition is collection for the PlayStation that contains ports of Langrisser IV and V. The collection was released in Japan on January 28, 1999 and featured graphics and gameplay that were updated from the original Sega Saturn releases.An English translation patch was released for the Final Edition of Langisser IV by Kil on July 2011.

similar_games.game: Langrisser V: The End of Legend
